!2 IIIF
Iiif information will be present on the response of a Read of a Image if the image has a JP2 representation generated and if the user has right to read it. 

 * '''Case 1:''' When reading an image with a Jp2 representation an IIIF protocol must be present. It must have a server and identifier properties in it. 
 * '''Case 2:''' When reading an any other binary that does not have any JP2 then IIIF should not be present.
